label: Central (2,0) Sampler
wl_code: With[{nLocal = 12, phi = GoldenRatio}, pAnc = (1/12)*Sum[pLocal[i], {i, 1, 12}] + Sqrt[nLocal/12]*phi/12; centralActive = (nLocal >= 9); {pAnc, centralActive}]
note: Central (2,0) sampler: p_anc = (1/12)*sum(p_i) + sqrt(n/12)*phi. Activates at n_local >= 9. Dimensional: 24+24+2=50 spacelike-like.
